functions.name: review_diff
functions.description: Review a unified diff and select hunks to apply or rework.

number.description: Index of the hunk in the diff. Starts from 1.

reason.description: Reason for applying or ignoring this hunk, or for asking for it to be reworked.

decision.description: Whether to apply this hunk, rework, or ignore it.

hunks.reason: The hunk correctly adds the SESSION_SECRET environment variable as required for session management. The accidental duplication of PORT=8080 is corrected by maintaining the original PORT line and adding the new SESSION_SECRET line.

response.review_notes: The changes made to the .env file are in line with the task requirements for implementing user authentication and session management. The addition of the SESSION_SECRET variable is necessary for secure session handling. The correction made to the PORT line ensures no unintended changes to the file structure or content.
